formattedAddress: 70 W 40th St, New York, NY 10018, USA
adrFormatAddress: 70 W 40th St, New York, NY 10018, USA

editorialSummary.text: Classic light fare & organic breads fill out the menu at this rustic-chic bakery/cafe chain.

originalText.text:
Convenient breakfast/ brunch spot located close to grand central. The ambiance here was really nice and homey. Our server Eric was really helpful and gave us good recommendations on what to order as well as recommendations on tourist sites in NYC which was really nice.
We ordered the Dutch mini pancakes which are delicious and the egg skillet (lacked a bit of flavour) but the sourdough bread was fresh and made up for it! Overall we enjoyed our experience and would recommend if you are in the area and need to fuel up for the day :)

text.text:

originalText.text:
Le Pain Quotidien in Bryant Park offers a cozy and delightful escape in the heart of New York City. During my recent visit, the tartine with chicken and tomatoes stole the show with its crunchy texture and juicy flavors. A simple yet satisfying choice.

The mini-muffins, available in apricot, banana, and apple, added a sweet touch to the experience. It's hard to pick a favorite among these bite-sized treats, each offering a unique burst of flavor.

The background music added to the warm ambiance, creating a pleasant setting for a casual meal. Special recognition goes to our server, Paulette, whose kindness and attentiveness enhanced our visit. Her friendly demeanor made us feel right at home.

In summary, Le Pain Quotidien is a charming spot for those seeking simple yet delightful fare in a welcoming atmosphere. Whether you're enjoying a tartine, savoring mini-muffins, or simply soaking in the ambiance, this spot in Bryant Park is a delightful retreat. Recommended for a relaxed and enjoyable dining experience.

originalText.text: Le Pain Quotidien's brunch sandwich with avocado is a delightful blend of freshness and flavor. The creamy avocado perfectly complements the other ingredients, creating a satisfying and delicious experience. Additionally, the welcoming atmosphere enhances the overall dining pleasure, making it an ideal spot for a delightful brunch.

The creamy avocado perfectly complements the other ingredients, creating a satisfying and delicious experience. Additionally, the welcoming atmosphere enhances the overall dining pleasure, making it an ideal spot for a delightful brunch.

originalText.text:
I used to love this chain. Went to 3 others in NY several times (up until 4~ years ago) and gave them all 5 stars. Has something changed or is it this specific place? . The food wasn't satisfying, the breakfast bowl had only one small egg overcooked (it said sunnyside) the bread was cold! And the coffee pumpkin latte was missing the cinnamon on top.
The place felt crowded (even though it wasn't that much) and about the service - my main waitress was lovely, but some two others were unhelpful and even rude. Idk.. I need maybe to try another branch to see if it's something general.

originalText.text: This place is very good, they have great food and good prices. The environment is very relaxing with good music. Their mix of flavors is spectacular; I had a chicken & mozzarella melt, it had pesto, tomatoes and arugula, very very good. My cousin had the smoked mozzarella and tomato sandwich, also very good. We finished with a waffle and chia pudding… omg, they were absolutely amazing, not too sweet, but really tasty and satisfying. Most definitely recommend this place to spend sometime and share with your people.
